description: Main source file for a Flutter mobile app that handles railway ticket booking, including UI screens, data models, local storage, and API interactions.

classes.name: AppInitializer
classes.description: Initializes providers for database and ticket state, and bootstraps the main app.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget defining app theme and home screen.

classes.name: TicketStorageService
classes.description: Service for storing and retrieving tickets from SQLite.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Handles API requests for searching trains and booking tickets.

classes.name: TrainSearchScreen
classes.description: UI screen for searching available trains.

classes.name: BookTicketScreen
classes.description: UI screen for booking a train ticket.

classes.name: TicketsScreen
classes.description: UI screen for viewing stored tickets.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, initializes environment and runs the app.
